On.description: Enable/disable the threshold. Powers on when landing pad center is active.

Open.description: 1 when silo doors are open, 0 when closed.

Lock.description: Prevents manual operation when set to 1.

Setting.description: Door open percentage (0 = closed, 100 = fully open).

Idle.description: 1 when silo is not moving, 0 when in motion.

Error.description: 1 when missing sound cartridge, step units, or speaker.

Time.description: Current playback time in seconds. Write to sync with stopwatch.

Bpm.description: Beats per minute. Controls playback speed.

SoundCartridge.description: Insert sound cartridge to select instrument sounds.

SoundAlert.description: Play alert sound when set to 1.

Open.description: 1 when solar panel is deployed, 0 when folded.

Battery.description: Insert battery to store generated solar power.

Error.description: 1 when robot encounters error (no battery, no chip, etc).

VelocityMagnitude.description: Robot's speed in meters per second.

VelocityRelativeX.description: Robot's velocity along local X axis.

VelocityRelativeY.description: Robot's velocity along local Y axis.

VelocityRelativeZ.description: Robot's velocity along local Z axis.

TargetX.description: Set target world X coordinate for navigation.

TargetY.description: Set target world Y coordinate for navigation.

TargetZ.description: Set target world Z coordinate for navigation.

Programmable Chip.description: IC chip for automated robot control.

Ore.description: Storage slots for mined ores (8 total).

On.description: Enable/disable vent. When on, actively moves atmosphere.

Mode.description: 0 = Inward (pull gas in), 1 = Outward (push gas out).

Lock.description: Prevents manual mode changes when set to 1.

Setting.description: Target pressure in kPa. Vent stops when reached.

PressureInput.description: Pressure on input side in kPa.

PressureOutput.description: Pressure on output side in kPa.

Lock.description: Prevents manual setting changes when set to 1.

Error.description: 1 when unit has error (no pipe connection, etc).

Open.description: 1 when airlock is open, 0 when closed.

Lock.description: Prevents manual operation when set to 1.

Power.description: Current power flow in watts. Positive = charging, negative = discharging.

ChargeRatio.description: Charge level as ratio (0 = empty, 1 = full).

PowerActual.description: Current power being drawn from battery.

Setting.description: Target charge ratio for automatic management.

Power.description: Current power flow in watts. Positive = charging, negative = discharging.

ChargeRatio.description: Charge level as ratio (0 = empty, 1 = full).

PowerActual.description: Current power being drawn from battery.

Setting.description: Target charge ratio for automatic management.

Error.description: 1 when unable to fabricate (no materials, power, etc).

RecipeHash.description: Recipe prefab hash to fabricate. Write to select recipe.

ExportCount.description: Number of items fabricated and exported.

ImportCount.description: Number of items imported for fabrication.

ClearMemory.description: Write 1 to reset ExportCount and ImportCount to zero.

Error.description: 1 when unable to process (no materials, power, etc).

RecipeHash.description: Current recipe prefab hash being processed.

Import.description: Input slot for ores and materials.

Error.description: 1 when unable to process (no materials, power, etc).

RecipeHash.description: Current recipe prefab hash being processed.

Import.description: Input slot for ores and materials.

On.description: Enable/disable power flow through this APC.

PowerPotential.description: Maximum available power from input side.

PowerRequired.description: Total power demanded by output side.

Lock.description: Prevents manual setting changes when set to 1.

PressureInput.description: Pressure on input side in kPa.

PressureOutput.description: Pressure on output side in kPa.

Ratio.description: Output pressure as ratio of setting (0 = 0%, 1 = 100%).

Setting.description: Dial position value. Read to get current setting, write to set remotely.

Color.description: LED color index for dial indicator light.

Setting.description: Slider position value. Read to get current setting, write to move slider.

Color.description: LED color index for slider indicator.
LED color index for switch indicator.

Setting.description: Button state. Momentarily 1 when pressed, then returns to 0.

Color.description: LED color index for button backlight.

Setting.description: Value to display on 2-digit LED screen.

Color.description: LED color for digit display.

Setting.description: Value to display on 3-digit LED screen.

Color.description: LED color for digit display.
Light color index.

Setting.description: Value to display on gauge needle (percentage).
Value to display on meter needle.

Charge.description: Current charge of battery in slot.

Maximum.description: Maximum capacity of battery in slot.

Error.description: 1 when unable to cook (no food, power, etc).

Open.description: 1 when bridge is extended, 0 when retracted.

Lock.description: Prevents manual operation when set to 1.

On.description: Enable/disable power flow through this APC.

PowerPotential.description: Maximum available power from input side.

PowerRequired.description: Total power demanded by output side.

Open.description: 1 when gate is open, 0 when closed.

Lock.description: Prevents manual operation when set to 1.
Prevents manual setting changes when set to 1.

Setting.description: Target output pressure in kPa for liquid phase.

PressureInput.description: Pressure on input side in kPa.

PressureOutput.description: Pressure on output side in kPa.

Ratio.description: Output pressure as ratio of setting.

Error.description: 1 when unable to mine (no power, full storage, etc).

Color.description: LED color index for lever indicator.
LED color index for dial indicator.

Setting.description: Switch state with safety cover. 0 = off, 1 = on.

Color.description: LED color index for switch indicator.
LED color index for switch indicator.

Setting.description: Value to display on gauge needle (percentage).

Color.description: Diode LED color.
Diode LED color.

Occupied.description: 1 when someone is sitting on the bench, 0 when empty.

Open.description: 1 when airlock is open, 0 when closed.

Lock.description: Prevents manual operation when set to 1.

Activate.description: Triggers to 1 momentarily when basketball scores.

Setting.description: Total score count (number of baskets made).

Charge.description: Current charge of battery in slot.

Maximum.description: Maximum capacity of battery in slot.
